subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Among the thousands of families displaced by the Chernobyl nuclear meltdown was that of Andriy Shevchenko, the captain of the Ukrainian team and one of the most menacing forwards at this World Cup.
snippet: Among the thousands of families displaced by the Chernobyl nuclear meltdown was that of Andriy Shevchenko, the captain of the Ukrainian team and one of the most menacing forwards at this World Cup.
